Blog.post: Look in my face, step in my soul, enter into this world of old. Can you sence the pain? Feel the cold? Please don't deny me, though I may be the enemy of your prayers. Can't you see that I'm just lonely and scared? ~*~Jaded Beauty~*~

A single shed tear, a drop of flesh blood, pierced heart in agonizing pain. When will things ever be the same? Can they even be? Jaded beauty, faded love, lost comfort; except from above. Destroyed dreams, desolated hope, shattered faith, non-excisting radiance. When will all sufferings dissappear? When will I be able to replace my essance into the hands of my earthly guardian? Will the burning spirit ever relinquish enough to be held again? Will the guardian ever be at peace to embrace it again? ~*~JadedBeauty~*~

A splattering of cool, moisture clings to glass. The drum roll of thunder, mixed with the tang of rain. She calls out to me, as if I could hear her voice, trying to chain me there, sheltered from the energy of the storm. Slick trails in the grass, so cold beneath bare feet. Hum of sharp lighting, static in the air. Humidity and heat- long forgotten- outstretched arms embracing crystalline water droplets Hair slicked to scalp, moist in the torrent of fresh sweet downpour, in cadence with thunder. Embrace cool water, the streams down my back plastering cloth to skin, and continuing its flow. Waterfall of droplets replacing each one spun off, as I circle in the grass, with two more clear beads. Run tongue over lips, tasting cool crispness, of the summer storm, and lightning. ~*~Essence~*~
Poetry and Lyrics... quotes... the things that inspire, and exspress... the essence of life... enjoy ~*~Essence~*~

A thousand stars to wish upon but I make no wish but one; to be counted as treasure in your eyes, valued as a jewel, raidiant and rare. No matter what life takes us throug I'll always be there for you. Waiting for the day that I can place my heart in open hands knowing it will be cared for. ~*~ Jaded Beauty~*~
I sang a song, the words lifted to the sky, I sang you a song, it was the essence of my life. I sang a song, for the moon and for the night, I sang a song, and now my life feels right. ~+~Essence~+~

Stare out of my lonely soul. wonder if youre lettin go. should i hold onto you heart? when nothings what it seems. relent -less is never more. wonder what you have in store. can i survive the nezxt step? when we're playin with fire. (and)if i go- would you stop me? falling down- try to catch me. fading to black- resurect my soul... if youd even know (to look for me beneath you) pictures taped to a wall. wonder what i just saw. can you ezxplain this to me? outrunning our destiny! Touchdown calling out your name. wonder is this all a game? did i fall into your trap? or is more still to come. (And)i dont know what to say. why do i always feel this way? are you pulling my strings? or just pulling me down. lower and lower mass confusion again. harder and harder the pounding within. how will this all end? (And) If i go- will you stop me? (I'm) fallin down- can you catch me? trapped in darkness- resurrect my soul. If you even know (to look for me beneath you) resurrect ressurect my soul ~*~Essence~*~

SCARLET DARKNESS Pain of a lost child, a fallen warrior, over-ran with lies of hatred. Burning torture to deep to touch. Blind eyes cast away from reality, dragged into the realm death. The realm of scarlet darkness. Whirlwinds of past despises, ridicules, tortures, words of poison, actions of blunt amusement. One by one nightmares recollect forcing the realm of scarelt darkness to become a reality entrapped upon minds, emotions, wrists. I realized something in that world of damnation, angels do excist. Two radiant rescuers steadfast by my side. Visions of love and care; pleading and prayer. A third bearing hope, understanding, never ending words of encouragement and care. Strong arms bears he, to lift me from the red stained void. Hands wrapped tight enclosed in the arms of the angels, never wanting to release. For fear grip is lost the fallen warrior might grow darker. No light is found upon her soul anymore. No hope sparkles within her eyes. Reality has no excistance except within the spirit of others, of friends and angels. Only one wish does she cling to, to escape the world of scarlet darkness forever.

Our Lost Innocence Gowing up too quick too quick... Now seeing a new world without youth's rose colored glasses. Innocent now in so few ways, i support a pyramid of friends, who can lift me high and hang me low. Learning the truth about pain... it comes, it goes, it stays. like scars and memories. Scars caused in love and rage desperation and pain betrayal and forgivness in and on and by friends... on a heart on a soul on a wrist. On one little cut a life changes. On two little drops of blood rests the future. On three minds sits the question and the knowlege of what has been done. And a tears shed, a thoughts read... and some where's an innocence dead. Dead to a world of not knowing. Discovered a truth yesterday... The world's lies are all the same. And the people we love are all that we have in the hard spots and worse... and the truth's covered over paved in little white lies by people who've never seen life, never fear never love never hate never pain... never smelled death waiting just to pull someone in. Saw the reasons today, the reality of my religion, in the voice of an angel. An angel with a towel on her wrist. covering razor blade cuts that i couldnt stop her from making. couldnt. wouldnt. didnt. And saw the truth in the eyes in the hands of a friend... sitting besides an angel. touching soothing praying caring and maybe even saving her life. And then the knowlege, that always stays behind. Driving need to prevent destruction, the destruction, of another innocence... To understand the knowlege of if a god really stops it, and we'll never know if we're that intervention... or another lost innocence facing the truth. And the truth is all lies. And the lies are all reality... and i'm learning about dying each day. Part of the patterns of life the soul's deepest desires... to live to breathe die and love Seeing the beauty and frailty of each child and baby. The frailty of friendships the destruction by time... killing the sweet innocence. the protection from life. And i'm learning the truths, of growing so quick. pain is life. hate is love. betrayal is friendship. and religion is the knowlege that we don't know the answers... when we've seen death. and known our lost innocence. ~+~Essence~+~

Alone My world fell apart today, With tears streaming down my face. And I couldn‚Äôt stand on my own, But I was standing alone. I cried alone. You promised me you‚Äôd always stand Beside me when I need a hand. Yet I‚Äôm crying to an empty sky, Because today you passed me by. Am I supposed to trust, Trust the one who‚Äôs turned away? Did you know you ignored, Ignored me on my hardest day? I‚Äôm crying alone. Calling out your given name, You don‚Äôt come and I can‚Äôt blame. I never should have believed, Should have known you‚Äôd leave. I don‚Äôt want to believe in my heart, That your promise has broken apart. But for now I‚Äôll suffer on, Trying to stand on my own. I‚Äôll cry alone. ~+~Essence~+~

Bottled Tear Drops Burning heart entrapped inside thorns. Fucked up lies of a so called love, while children lie dead with blood staind blades. Another ounce of the bottled filled, tears held captive inside a fragile cage. Shattered by abuse, painful words, blunt looks, empty presences. Floods wash away the crimzon sea only to appear pure. Can't you see the ocean is weeping? Are you able to tell when rain is crying, or is it to juvanile to invest love? ~*~Jaded Beauty~*~

Good night my blessed ones. May you rest peacefully in the arms of the Father. The love of God guide you through the night, and awaken you to a new dawn. The sweetness and care which you have shown to us brings light to our hearts, warmth to our soul, and a thousand smiles upon our faces. We love you, dear brothers, and all the ways you lead us on, encourage us, strengthen us, and help us to grow. We are truly blessed to have angels like you, in our lives and within our hearts. And will forever remember your kindness in our prayers. *this was written for all the guys who went on the winter retreat* ~*~Jaded Beauty~*~

God blesses those who serve and help, with you among the rest. With you there to keep us smiling we count ourselves truly blessed. Light of God guide you, and love of God save. And we'll count eachother lucky for all these gifts He gave. And while we think upon these gifts He'll hold you in HIs embrace; May your dreams by full of life, from the one who shows us grace. ~+~Essence~+~

How Many Times How many times must I sit back and watch as angelic demons rip at your soul? Victom to next, they take turns dragging us into the woods of hell, hidden secrets, erie beauty, captivating danger. Echos of wisdom lost in the web of confused desire. Looks so radiant, smiles so pure, mind so empty, emotions not true. How many times must I watch angels be hurt? Whispers of sweet promises draw thee so far away. Vain attempts to bring angels back, lost in the tangle of a dream. How many times must devils be fought off, only for one to appear after each death? So painful an event, to know my words are crushed by decieving eyes. How many times will they hurt us? How many times will we escape, only to enter another attack? How many times? ~*~Jaded Beauty~*~

Sweetest Death Did you cry when i died the sweetest death? Amid a waterfall of crimson droplets? The silvered sharp touch of the blade. Kissing my skin the way you never did. I died the sweetest death, in a burgundy river. White sleeves stained in an older wine's color. It was a quick pain, a wonderful pain. A hurt i didnt share, not even with you. Did you wonder about the smile? That i wore in the sweetest death? I missed the pain more than i ever missed you. Its kiss was a stronger high, that made me so drunk. I died the sweetest death, at the end of my scarlet stained life. Crisp lines cut away my ties and kissed me senseless. I never felt the arrival of my sweet. sweet death. All i could feel was the release you made me dream of for so long. ~+~Essence~+~
Twos, live in a world of pairs. The soul and its reflection a world and its photo negative. To combine the dualism, dreams and reality. The only solo, Life. ~+~Essence~+~

Thoughts in words, so difficult a concept. Emotions on paper, seemingly impossible. What cure is there to an over-ran mind in which the web is to intricite to untangle? Thoughts race, time erased, no rescue place, no sweet embrace. No release for a mind entraped inside thorns of confusion. Who will hear the words, so difficult to utter? Who will ease the pain, to complex to express? A guardian angel... in spirit or flesh. Calls echo to thee, but none respond. All fall short, empty presences, misled actions, unknown brokenness. There is no rescurer. ~*~Jaded Beauty~*~

My wish finally came true in it's entirety. I was able to let go of you. Though memories of gold flood my mind you're no longer good for me. You bring me pain. I shared my darkest truth with you, and you turned back to your reality, not stopping for a second to reach into mine. I loved you, and a small part of me always will, but I bid you farewell. Welcome to my past, where you'll remain. ~*~Jaded Beauty~*~

If I opened up my soul to you, would you read it? If I allowed you to see the truth in my eyes, would you look into them? if a hundred new scars appeared on my wrist, would you seriously care? What am I to you? What do I make you feel.... happy, angry, pained, annoyed, bothered, are you tired of wearing your christian persona? Could you handle my reality? My hate my love my anger my pain. If you knew all of me, the very essence of my being would you still be around? ~*~Jaded Beauty~*~

My eyes cry bloody tears, invisible to most human eyes. Glimpses only shown never read. The protector of my soul, so close I can feel the kisses of his spirit, yet so far a hundred blood drops go by un-noticed. Smile of radiance, eyes of love, heart not free to give away. The wonderer ever present, yet blind to open wounds. Tears close to drop on his cheek, skin to numb to notice. A word of care, a prayer of hope, actions of misleading. Twinkling eye, confused heart, emotions at a standstill. ~*~Jaded Beauty~*~ First half is Andy, who's radiance keeps me alive. Second part is Aaron, who I don't know what to think of yet

In the endless brief instant that is a heartbeat I can see the world. Because I am not your or any ordinary girl. With a bitterness i have always possessed in the depth of my soul I can sing of gut-wrenching pain and rejection. That it does and does not belong to me is reguardless. I am silver charms, hoop earrings and black shadow. And yet or because I try you see me in a light of bangles and sandals and glitter. But I hate you comparing me to her and her and her and who cares what they are saying who do not know? Because I am anything but or as I am just your everyday young lady you'll never see the maturity of what I do or say. Assuming that or excluding that it requires you to see past the end of your world to even dare take a glimpse of mine. But I am everything or maybe nothing to everyone and anyone. Even as I sing of love and lust with tears of fear I am just as or maybe much less innocent than that girl you see me as. But you're looking for a lap cat, a soft rain tap, and a pair of summer sunshine eyes. How can I ever try to or want to be what you ask of me when in my reality I am the thunder roll of the rainstorm, grey touched with turquoise, and the she tiger ready and poised. I'm singing the song of the dreamer's lucid dreams and youre climbing the walls to escape the reality. For the right price or more so the least cost you can substitute what in me you've lost and the packaging's so deceptive. Take your sun beams, daydreams and name brand jeans and shove 'em. Because you've destroyed my chance at every dream I never had. Found out this morning that the world's gonna end when it pleases, reguardless or besides all of your lost thank yous and pleases. Because you thought I could be your cheerleader girl you've found out or lost your best girl. I tried to sing while I dance and lost a chance at forever but I have no or too many regrets from my choices. Can you say any more or less about your world- no you couldn't. And this is a song about how you see the world around you and nothing around you will be me. Because whether you like it or not I am that letter written in red pen, the broken rose colored glasses, and dancing in a summer thunderstorm. And for all that it passes or does not pass by your eyes I am only ever going to be one thing in this song about the world. A double X mystery. ~+~Essence~+~

The stains on hands, a crimson glow never erased, reminding you of the pain, perhaps deadly wounds inflicted upon those, not unlike yourself. In your never ending struggles, against the rest of your humanity, you manage to slowly murder yet one more innocence, in the name of popularity. I will not help you pull the trigger on the weapon of your mouth‚Äôs destruction. You alone will reap the harvest, but a dozen others will fall with you, in an effort to express. When the next grief stricken mother, and stunned community come on TV, will you be there to apologize for the deaths senseless words, your words and actions cause? I will not clean up your bloody mess, with hands finally clear of guilt, when luck runs out along with time. The cost of conformity is the blood that stains your hands while you continue to laugh. ~+~Essence~+~

Friday night in her livin room again. Time once was she'd wait to hear from them. The one who set fire to her sould with his touch, the one who understood her needs oh so much. But pages turn in the night at quarter til and in the depths of her heart she loves both of them still. theres a few old letters of polite interest folded up in the pages of a notebook on her desk. A few evening of fiery caress before a quick goodbye he tells her's for the best. And she remembers every smile just before she thinks of tears. but if she ever thought they loved her its in the long past years. Shes turning pages in the moonlight night knowing a piece of her heart loves both of them still. Mayvbe someday she'll see his sweet face without reaching for that spot on her neck. Maybe one day he'll call her to say that wihtout her his life was a wreck. But this friday night when her friends go out to dance she'll reach up on that shelf and read a long romance. cause in the depths of her heart, oh she knows it's all over but in the depths of her heart she loves both of them still. ~+~Essence~+~

A broken heart shatterd upon bladed shards who's name is truth, honesty, reality. Collected in hands that both break and protect withdraw and step forward look away and reach to. Love draws pain respect brings forth tears care crushes dreams. A sparkling eye that kills, hypnotizes, aggrivates, captivates. Kind words influct wounds. Love is hate, hate is pain, pain is truth, truth is freedom, freedom is death, death is beauty. ~*~Jaded Beauty~*~

IRISH BLESSING May the road rise up to meet you, May the wind be always at your back. May the sun shine warm upon your face May the rains fall soft upon your fields. And until we meet again, may god hold you in the palm of his hand. May our children and their descendents be the ones to find a lasting peace, May their hopes and dreams become united, May the past be left for those who hate. And until we meet again, may love and trust find a way to make a stand. May this world and all its wonders be home to all humanity, May the people find a common purpose, May we help one another to survive, And until we meet again may Mother Earth pour her heart into our hands.

I think ive upset Kairsie...or at least cause a stir...enough that she put my question in her blog...so now i'm putting some in here that she cant answer very easily... 1)Did Noah have woodpeckers on the ark? If he did, where did he keep them? 2)How come you pay an extra 25 cents to get something put on your hamburger but they don't take off the price if you get something taken off? 3)Why do they call the small candy bars the "fun sizes"? Wouldn't be more fun to eat a big one? 4)364 days of the year, parents tell their kids not to take candy from strangers, yet on Halloween, its encouraged! Why is that ? 5)Since there is a rule that states "i" before "e" except after "c", wouldn't "science" be spelled wrong? 6)What did cured ham actually have? 7)Are children who use sign language allowed to talk with their mouth full? 8)If a criminal turns himself in shouldn't he get the reward money? 9)Why is it that people say they "slept like a baby" when babies wake up like every two hours? 10)What would happen if: Everyone was to flush their toilet at the same time? 11)Is an alcoholic just a drunk that's scared of a hangover? 12)If our planet is inhabited with creatures made by God...is it possible that there's another planet inhabited with creatures made by the Devil? 13)If you don't pay your exorcist, do you get repossessed? 14)Is there anything easier done than said? 15)If money is the root of all evil then how come churches ask for it? 16)If ignorance is bliss, why arent more people happy? 17)Why does the label on childrenôs Tylenol tell you not to operate heavy machinery or vehicles when it's for CHILDREN!? 18)When you put 'THE' and 'IRS' together, it forms 'THEIRS'. Coincidence? I think not 19)If all the nations in the world are in debt, where did all the money go? 20)What do you say when someone says you're in denial, but you're not? 21)How many licks does it take to get to the center of a tootsie pop? 22)If an anarchist group attained political power, would they by principle have to dissolve their own government? 23)If an ambulance is on its way to save someone, and it runs someone over, does it stop to help them? 24)If you decide that you're indecisive, which one are you? 25)If love is blind, how can we believe in love at first sight? Did you ever notice that the people who stereotype are the ones who coplain about it the most? So i was talking with friends friday, and it reminded me about something that happened at Club Worship last saturday...Now everyone KNOWS we arent supposed to judge on appearances alone. But people do and did. The people who take the trouble to know me are aware that i'm a christian...and most of my closer friends know i've been one my entire life, to the point where i decided to be rebaptised when i was 12. And those same people could tell you i only JUST started wearing the silver pentacle pendant i have. A friend of mine, Ashley, also wears one. We decided to see how many people would comment to us about them, and wore them to Club Worship...for the first time ever.(i normally wear my cross) but anywayz, no one actually said anything TO us, but at least one group of girls was talking ABOUT us. And Ashley and her boyfriend were near them at the time...as they discussed how we "Need to abandon our evil pagan ways," and how "i've been coming here so often, and i still havent been saved." Amusing what a peice of misunderstood jewelry causes, isnt it? (little FYI: the pentacle with its 5 points and circle stands for the unity of the 4 cardinal elements and the spirit. a symbol of unity and peace. hardly evil now, isnt it?) so yeah, countin down til the 12th...26 days i beleive...cant get outta school quick enough. reminder to self, hitting dorney with ashley and jay instead of w/school...gotta remember the money for her by fri. yawn...i'm so out of it today...i actually didnt MIND going to the dentist...tells you how tired i am. then again, with that rope torture yesterday i was ready to crash when i got home...actually i'm stil ready to crash...yawn...

I'm sorry. Shattered faith's crystal vase, the container of my trust, and let it spill away... Fragments fall away, like petals on the rose, leaving only the briars... Glue can only pull slivers back into form, urn never the same, a rose can't unwilt it's petals... You've shattered my faith and can't fix it, You've pulled away the roses hope, as you kneel now in prayer.

I do not need this crap right now... let me make a list of my faults... maybe someone else willl see where i'm screwed up... heaven knows i cant see it... bitchy bossy pushy low self esteem annoying jealus cold hearted uncaring annoying voice geeky nerdy talks too much reads too much not popular not experianced too smart too flirt flirts badly bad teeth, bad taste in clothes bad singer obsessive selfsatisfied artist half ass poet lame writer not 100% religiously convicted... 3rd wheel dont fit in wont fit in unskilled not a fantastic student not an athlete glasses frizzy hair red hair small chest anorexically skinny freckles not pretty no money not good enough, expendable useless As if i don't have enough trouble, and enough problems...lets add monday night and it's problems...what the hell? Someday's swallowing a bottle of pills or something stupid like that sounds wonderful...but i dont really want to die, and i know it...i just want to be someone else, in a different life, a different world... Isnt it enough for the world, that i try to be there for my friends? That i listen to their probolems and crap? And then , in return, i have almost noone to turn to when i need a shoulder... or at least that understand what i'm going through... loyalty...thats what i need...I mean, i know i said everything was okay...and i really dont blame her at all. she cant help who she loves...an i underastand that she never meant to hurt me...even though she managed too. no, i hurt myself... if i didnt always fall for guys like this, , i never get bloody hurt. or hurt someone else... i dont blame you 2...i just want to know why i'm not good enough! why i dont have someone who's mine alone. I know i was calm as ice the other day, when i found out...maybe it was shock...maybe it was denial... i dont know...i mean, i sat, and i thought about it... i really thought about it...How the hell does something like that just happen? Seriously, and i'm still not pissed, i'm not even mad...just dissapointed...and hurt...maybe afterwards you 2 felt guilty about it...and sorry, but at the time...admit it, i was the thing farthest from your thoughts. And i'm sorry to do this, because it's going to hurt, but i need some time to calm down, and figure things out...Until i know where i stand...We're over. I know i should say thisin person, but i know if i do, i wont be able to focus, or go through with it... and i need to... So maybe this makes me a weak, cruel, coldhearted bitch...i already know i am, tell me something new. Maybe "just friends" is a bit hard...but right now i need a friend more than a commitment. ~Cat

Tonight i'm falling away, embrace deep depths of my dreams. leave you behind on the brink of reality, i'd call out if i could speak. surrendar my voice for a sea of dreams. reality into mind illusions. (Pre chorus) collapse on the edge, slide off into forever, catch me, and i'll slip through your fingers. (Chorus) Falling away tonight, leave reality behind. dropping down towards forever, dreams reveal my true mind. I'm falling away from you. Dreams grow as i fall in, my mind to see furture's sights. reveal everything, and nothing at all, as i forget your earthly delight, when you fail to catch me once more, and i fall down again. Chorus I still stumble, i still fall down, float past my daytime thoughts, explore the corners of my mind. discover my heart. would you ever truly catch me? or will i always fall away? (Bridge) I stumble, the edge of reality crumbles, my night mares come to life. Curl fingers about my hands yet i fall, a ghost can't embrace the living. wake up to find my dreamwold is the place i'm seeing. Did you ever try to save me? Or did you mean for me to fall? Prechorus Chorus 2X I'm falling away from you 2X Catch me again, and i'll watch you fall away.

Leave the copy machine set to 99 copies, reduce 200%, extra dark, 17-inch paper. 2. In the memo field of all your checks, write, "for sensual massage." 3. Specify that your drive-through order is "to go." 4. If you have a glass eye, tap on it occasionally with your pen while talking with others. 5. Stomp on little plastic ketchup packets. 6. Insist on keeping your car windshield wipers running in all weather conditions, "to keep them tuned up." 7. Reply to everything someone says with, "that's what YOU think" 8. Practice making fax and modem noises. 9. Highlight irrelevant information in scientific papers and copy them to your boss. 10. Make beeping noises when you back up. 11. Finish all your sentences with the words, "in accordance with prophecy." 12. Signal that a conversation is over by clamping your hands over your ears. 13. Disassemble your pen and "accidentally" flip the ink cartridge across the room. 14. Holler random numbers while someone is counting. 15. Adjust the tint on your TV so that all the people are green, and insist to others that you "like it that way." 16. Staple papers in the middle of the page. 17. Publicly investigate just how slowly you can make a "croaking" noise. 18. Honk and wave to strangers. 19. Decline to be seated at a restaurant, and simply eat the complimentary mints by the cash register. 20. TYPE ONLY IN UPPERCASE. 21. type only in lowercase. 22. dont use any punctuation either 23. Buy a large quantity of orange traffic cones and reroute entire streets. 24. Repeat the following conversation a dozen times: "Do you hear that?" "What?" "Never mind, it's gone now." 25. As much as possible, skip rather than walk. 26. Try playing the William Tell Overture by tapping on the bottom of your chin. When nearly done, announce, "No, wait -- I messed it up." Then repeat. 27. Ask people what gender they are. 28. While making presentations, occasionally bob your head like a parakeet. 29. Sit in your front yard pointing a hair dryer at passing cars to see if they slow down. 30. Sing along at the opera. 31. Go to a poetry recital and ask why each poem doesn't rhyme. 32. Ask your co-workers mysterious questions, then scribble their answers in a notebook and mutter something about "psychological profiles." 33. ~If paybacks a bitch and revenge is sweet. i'm the sweetest bitch you will ever meet.~ ~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~ Laura once told me about a skit someone she knew did. It made me think. She acted it out for us at Youth Musical the one night. Laura sat down, with a belaying rope tied in a noose, hanging around her neck. naturally, everyone wasconcerned about it, and a number of people wanted her to take it off. She asked them why? what was wrong with wearing a noose? someone answered that it could kill people... you hang yourself with a noose. She nodded and looked at the other people sitting with us. She asked people what they had around their necks, since she wore a noose. One of the counselors, Andy, had a gold chain on, with a gold cross. Someone pointed, and said a cross. So she repeated that... "you cant wear a noose, because it kills people. But a cross is okay... because no one ever died on a cross." That was the summer before last, and it still sticks with me... think about it. ~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~ welcome to day 5795(give or take a day roughly) of my misunderstood life... and while i realize my friends are just so wonderful and are of course kjust mentioning the "rumors" going around because they want me to be informed, not because they beleive them of course, it does hurt a bit... Maybe i dont always concetrate on every service i go to, but at least i am following my God. Maybe i dont give up everything for him, dont lay down my heart and soul for him... but i have YET to see one of my friends, the ones who've talked about me, lay down everything. "Youre not a strong enough christian" "be a better christian" "if you were only a more faithfull christian" SHUT UP and listen to yourselves. Its just a name... and youre turning it into an icon... as if being called a christian is the best thing in the world. If people who followed God, and BELIEVED(note, not followed or worshiped) in his son Christ ere called sludge, it would not be used so often, as an excuse for everything.... If i am not a good christian, than let me be a good pagan, a good stickdweller, to be the last to see God's kindom... because i don't want what is offered to me at the cost of conformity by those who claim it is my eternal salvation at risk... i'm already living in my personal Hell, created by the people i love most, who are trying so hard to save me. And i cant explain it in words... its thoughts, ideas, and feelings, all rolled into one... and utterly unexpressable... at least in the tongues i know... but somehow, it seems like I'm cut off almost completely from the way everyone thinks... with only a thread or two connecting me... with only one or two people in the whole world who understand me........ and somedays i dont even have them. think of me what you please. laugh, scold, ridicule, proclaim me damned. I'll hear your words... but they have lost their meaning with overuse.

and sooo on..... And weíre talking about mask in Honors EuroÖ Mann has us reading In Praise of Folly, by ErasumusÖ which discusses how in older plays, if you had taken off the masks of actors, roles would be reversedÖ because things are not what they appear, and each actor plays more than one partÖ then he equates it to our actual societyÖ now, this wouldnít have seemed that big of a concept, except one of the last times I was at Youth Group, one of the Prayer Group Leaders, Gabby, had talked to us about taking off our masks, and what type of masks we show to the world, and what we hid behind themÖ And in Class, Mr. Mann made the equation to the idea of dating someone thinking they were one person, then seeing behind the mask, and not necessarily liking what you seeÖ which completely makes senseÖ expecially when I think about the whole mask concept, because I know I present a number of masks, a number of personalitiesÖ I have the person I am with my parents, and familyÖ I have the persona I adopt for school, the image I present to those at church and youth group, the faÁade I raise around friendsÖ and it builds upÖ to where if I didnít know I did it, I would think that those people called Cat werenít meÖ because I only have one real mask, one persona, that I wear that is almost my ìtrue imageîÖ that being who I am at Swatara, away from people who know me 24/7, that expect me to act a certain wayÖ and Iím not saying thatís not a mask tooÖ because it is; they expect a perfect Christian, and if not perfect, then at least secure, and conservativeÖ and Iím neitherÖ I may not dress like a slut, but the clothes I select for camp arenít my normal summer fairÖ I donít believe as completely as they do in GodÖ maybe because of any of a hundred reasonsÖ and Iím rambling nowÖ for anyone who read this far, I hope you thought about something newÖ If itís Casey, sis, I canít explain my religious beliefs to youÖ Iíve tried, and canít even begin to put it to wordsÖ. Donít think badly of me for itÖ Iíve tried. God knows Iíve triedÖ

Alone My world fell apart today, With tears streaming down my face. And I couldnít stand on my own, But I was standing alone. I cried alone. You promised me youíd always stand Beside me when I need a hand. Yet Iím crying to an empty sky, Because today you passed me by. Am I supposed to trust, Trust the one whoís turned away? Did you know you ignored, Ignored me on my hardest day? Iím crying alone. Calling out your given name, You donít come and I canít blame. I never should have believed, Should have known youíd leave. I donít want to believe in my heart, That your promise has broken apart. But for now Iíll suffer on, Trying to stand on my own. Iíll cry alone. This is going to be ver long so get comfy. *My weekend was a good oneÖ overall full of fun, deep thoughts, and growth. The road rally taught me to wear 2 pairs of socks in winter, that any McDonalds open at Midnight is to be praised, and that life is full of wrong turns. And it had a few other comparisons as explained by our speaker Kendall. The niceness war continued with help of the girlís side Saturday morning. We made breakfast for the guys and served them in bedÖ which has now prompted the phrase ìtrust in Janelle.î In return for our work Jeremy and Victor cleaned the dishes for us, and Sunday morning all of the guys set the table, put out flowers, and served us breakfast with personalized poems. So after a few closed conferences, and worries that we wouldnít be able to out-nice the boys, Deanna, Laura, Kairsie, me and some others wrote poems to go on the guys doors, made up ëlil baggies of candy to go on each pillow, and made their beds. ~_~ But who knows what the guys are going to do in retaliation? Hmm... anywayz the whole weekend definately proved that i have the best friends ever... oh wait, i already knew that... and it helped me re-establish my faith again... definately among the best things. And the weekend made me think. *Alex, thank you for your concern and for talking to me... Even if i was half asleep at the time and temperarily confuzzled. The image you shared with me will definately stay in my mind for a while. And you're right; I do have a lot of thorns that prevent me from living... And i've been thinking about that a lot the last week and a half or so... Some of my closest friends have no clue just how much my "thorns" affect my life... or how they grew and why... And maybe listing them here won't make everything better, but for me its a step closer...admitting them in words instead of thoughts. *I don't trust people. Maybe on the outside i do... but not really. I've known this for awhile now... and a lot of my problems come from it. My parents... they're probably the only people in the world that i completely and entirely trust in. I know in my heart that they would never betray me, or knowingly hurt me. Theyd never give up on me, and because of that, i trust them more than i've ever trusted anyone else. And because of them, i think i'm more comfortable around older people... but i really dont know. *It didnt occur to me that i'd been so untrusting of people... of my friends, until Dennis pointed it out to me, innocently, in a chainletter email... one of those ones that you send to friends, and they fill out about you... well it was his answer for "what about me do you most dislike?" I think it comes from elementary school... back when i lived on the other side of the bridge. That was my world when i was little. And if part of my world when i was younger was a girl who hated me for 7 years of my existance... well that's life. So Lauren Czarneki hated me, and i still dont know why. My parents, Lord bless them, swear she was jealous of me. But what have i ever been or had to be jealous of? I was a short kid, with big glasses, who read too much, and dressed differently. If anything, back then i was sheltered. And that girl hated me. She pretended to be my friend more than once, only to stab me in the back. In first grade, she tried to hurt my best friend by pushing us apart... and she knew it hurt me. I don't think i've ever forgiven Lauren for that. That girl stole from me, degraded me, made my life miserable, and because she got other people to help her... after awhile it became part of me...i believed what they said. *I still do, despite how i act, and what people tell me... Guys expecially. Some of the kids i was friends with in preK and kindergarden... swapped sides later on...if you can say that... Apparently you couldnt be friends with me and Lauren back then. Other friends left at the end of the year... and never came back. When i saw saw of them, they werent the same people. And most of the others... they were never really my friends. The guys teased me...a LOT. I really hated being made fun of. Or used. Some kids became friends with me for a little because teachers liked me... Teachers are guardian angels in disguise, i swear. *To make a long story short...I don't trust people because i've been hurt more than a few times by the ones i've trusted. I'm afraid if i open up, completely, it'll happen again. I don't depend on guys or let them to emotionally close because i always seem to get hurt... I act like everything's fine and that nothing bothers me because people have used my faults and weaknesses against me. People depend on me to be strong, to be a helping hand and a comforting shoulder. I LIKE being there for them... but when i need that same sort of listening ear...they're paying attention to something else... or arent there. So I act like everythings great... because i'm scared. If i venture my beliefs or thoughts around others...even if i can argue them 100%, i'm looked at as different, strange, rebellious, or wrong... *Back in August i wrote a list of things...things i felt were true about myself. It's a list i revert to whenever something big and hurtful happens... That i can't forget... At the time it was posted because someone i was begining to trust a great deal bretrayed that trust... with a ver close friend of mine. I've forgiven both of them... i KNOW they never wanted to hurt me... But with my trust broken i had to let go of something that was special to me... That relationship will never be regained. I wouldn't want to copy it with someone else either... And this isn't where i meant to go with this, but i feel i have to write it. That person, who i had to let go of, is doing himself a great injustice. He made a promise to himself that he broke... A promise that anyone who cared about him should help him honor. And he seems to have forgotten it since August... It makes me sad that someone, who has more faith in God than i may ever have, has abandoned a promise they made to themself and God... I'm going to remember that image... And i'm going to try to remove my thorns... And i know i can't do it alone.

Somehow i just feel so.... lost I prayed today. in the middle of the afternoon. for no real reason except that i just felt that i should. and somehow...it helped... A literal and spiritual cool breeze in the warm air. I know it sounds weird to some people reading this, to others its too true...but anywayz.... it did help. Except now i just feel ver lost... Ive finally come to understand my religious beleifs fully... and what that means in my relationship with God... but the rest of my life seems to fall to peices when i concentrate on faith...and vice versa... i never seem to find the middle road. And lately i've noticed a pattern in my relationships... bad to horrible. all the guys that ever really like me... i dont care about in that way... even if it takes a bit to realise it, it always comes down to just not feeling the same about them as they think they do about me... maybe i am really the cold hearted bitch i've been labled... its so easy for me to lock up emotions... because i dont normally feel strongly about anyone.... and when i do...it blows up in my face. or gets me into cycles like this... where i just wish i could want to die... it really sux ! All my friends and their wonderful relationships... so happy... and its so easy for them...expecially keri, ashley, and christine... And i cant even get a date for prom ! Kairsie cares... but what about the others? if i just stopped showing up at school, would they bother to find out what was wrong? I feel so taken for granite some days. I wonder about things a lot. maybe too much. and my poetrys been getting more depressed lately. But I'll be getting my License soon... another month or so hoepfully... And fourth Quarter starts on tuesday...and after that, only another year until college. Maybe then i'll be able to just concentrate on school and faith, and being on my own... and forget the fact that i cant have a good girl/guy relationship worth a hill a beans...

A cute lil anecdote i found online... While taking a routine vandalism report at an elementary school, I was interrupted by a little girl about 6 years old. Looking up and down at my uniform, she asked, "Are you a cop?" "Yes," I answered and continued writing the report. "My mother said if I ever needed help I should ask the police. Is that right?" "Yes, that's right," I told her. "Well, then," she said as she extended her foot toward me, "would you please tie my shoe?"
